question.text: The <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>X</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>Y</mi></math> plane be taken as the boundary between two transparent media <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> in <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Z</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math> has a refractive index of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> with <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Z</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></math> has a refractive index of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>. A ray of light travelling in <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> along the direction given by the vector <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mover><mi>A</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn><mi>i</mi></msqrt><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>j</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mover><mi>k</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></math>, is incident on the plane of separation. The value of difference between the angle of incident in <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and the angle of refraction in <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> will be _____ degree.

solution.text:
Given: A→=43i-33j-5k^

As incident vector A makes i angle with normal Z-axis and refracted vector R makes r angle with normal Z- axis.

The angle made by the incident ray with the normal is given as 

i=cos-1AzA=cos-15(43)2+(33)2+52

=cos-1510⇒i=60°

Applying Snell's law of refraction at the interface of two media 

μ1sini=μ2sinr

⇒2sin60°=3×sinr

⇒r=45°

Difference between i and r =60°-45°=15°
